short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect to Scrypta Ecosystem directly from your browser and manage funds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Scrypta Ecosystem in a single extension. 

Create your Scrypta ID

The tool to use and manage digital identities on all Scrypta ecosystem dApps.

This browser extension creates a secure environment for managing Scrypta identities. Through these identities, which can be comfortably managed through a simple graphical interface, you can access all official Scrypta dApps with a single click.
